title: Payment Handler
description: Schema for UCP payment handlers. Handlers define how payment instruments are processed.

platform_schema.title: Payment Handler (Platform Schema)
platform_schema.description: Platform declaration for discovery profiles. May include partial config state required for discovery.

business_schema.title: Payment Handler (Business Schema)
business_schema.description: Business declaration for discovery profiles. May include partial config state required for discovery.

response_schema.title: Payment Handler (Response Schema)
response_schema.description: Handler reference in responses. May include full config state for runtime usage of the handler.
